texto: defines a road map for software process improvement. For assessors: ï£§ a framework for conducting assessments. ISO/IEC TR 15504 is not intended to be used in any scheme for the certification/registration of the process capability of an organization. Components of ISO/IEC TR 15504 ISO/IEC TR 15504 is composed of nine parts. This clause describes each of the parts and its role within ISO/IEC TR 15504. Part 1 Part 9 Concepts and Vocabulary introductory guide Part 7 Part 8 Part 6 Guide for use in process Guide for use in Guide to competency of improvement determining supplier assessors process capability Part 3 Part 4 Performing an Guide to performing assessment assessments Part 2 Part 5 A
